name: Pickthall
text: By those who set the ranks in battle order

name: Pickthall
text: And those who drive away (the wicked) with reproof

name: Pickthall
text: And those who read (the Word) for a reminder,

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thy Lord is surely One;

name: Pickthall
text: Lord of the heavens and of the earth and all that is between them, and Lord of the sun's risings.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! We have adorned the lowest heaven with an ornament, the planets;

name: Pickthall
text: With security from every froward devil.

name: Pickthall
text: They cannot listen to the Highest Chiefs for they are pelted from every side,

name: Pickthall
text: Outcast, and theirs is a perpetual torment;

name: Pickthall
text: Save him who snatcheth a fragment, and there pursueth him a piercing flame.

name: Pickthall
text: Then ask them (O Muhammad): Are they stronger as a creation, or those (others) whom we have created? Lo! We created them of plastic clay.

name: Pickthall
text: Nay, but thou dost marvel when they mock

name: Pickthall
text: And heed not when they are reminded,

name: Pickthall
text: And seek to scoff when they behold a portent.

name: Pickthall
text: And they say: Lo! this is mere magic;

name: Pickthall
text: When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then, forsooth, be raised (again)?

name: Pickthall
text: And our forefathers?

name: Pickthall
text: Say (O Muhammad): Ye, in truth; and ye will be brought low.

name: Pickthall
text: There is but one Shout, and lo! they behold,

name: Pickthall
text: And say: Ah, woe for us! This is the Day of Judgment.

name: Pickthall
text: This is the Day of Separation, which ye used to deny.

name: Pickthall
text: (And it is said unto the angels): Assemble those who did wrong, together with their wives and what they used to worship

name: Pickthall
text: Instead of Allah, and lead them to the path to hell;

name: Pickthall
text: And stop them, for they must be questioned.

name: Pickthall
text: What aileth you that ye help not one another?

name: Pickthall
text: Nay, but this day they make full submission.

name: Pickthall
text: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.

name: Pickthall
text: They say: Lo! ye used to come unto us, imposing, (swearing that ye spoke the truth).

name: Pickthall
text: They answer: Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers.

name: Pickthall
text: We had no power over you, but ye were wayward folk.

name: Pickthall
text: Now the Word of our Lord hath been fulfilled concerning us. Lo! we are about to taste (the doom).

name: Pickthall
text: Thus we misled you. Lo! we were (ourselves) astray.

name: Pickthall
text: Then lo! this day they (both) are sharers in the doom.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thus deal We with the guilty.

name: Pickthall
text: For when it was said unto them, There is no Allah save Allah, they were scornful

name: Pickthall
text: And said: Shall we forsake our gods for a mad poet?

name: Pickthall
text: Nay, but he brought the Truth, and he confirmed those sent (before him).

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! (now) verily ye taste the painful doom -

name: Pickthall
text: Ye are requited naught save what ye did -

name: Pickthall
text: Save single-minded slaves of Allah;

name: Pickthall
text: For them there is a known provision,

name: Pickthall
text: Fruits. And they will be honoured

name: Pickthall
text: In the Gardens of delight,

name: Pickthall
text: On couches facing one another;

name: Pickthall
text: A cup from a gushing spring is brought round for them,

name: Pickthall
text: White, delicious to the drinkers,

name: Pickthall
text: Wherein there is no headache nor are they made mad thereby.

name: Pickthall
text: And with them are those of modest gaze, with lovely eyes,

name: Pickthall
text: (Pure) as they were hidden eggs (of the ostrich).

name: Pickthall
text: And some of them draw near unto others, mutually questioning.

name: Pickthall
text: A speaker of them saith: Lo! I had a comrade

name: Pickthall
text: Who used to say: Art thou in truth of those who put faith (in his words)?

name: Pickthall
text: Can we, when we are dead and have become mere dust and bones - can we (then) verily be brought to book?

name: Pickthall
text: He saith: Will ye look?

name: Pickthall
text: Then looketh he and seeth him in the depth of hell.

name: Pickthall
text: He saith: By Allah, thou verily didst all but cause my ruin,

name: Pickthall
text: And had it not been for the favour of my Lord, I too had been of those haled forth (to doom).

name: Pickthall
text: Are we then not to die

name: Pickthall
text: Saving our former death, and are we not to be punished?

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! this is the supreme triumph.

name: Pickthall
text: For the like of this, then, let the workers work.

name: Pickthall
text: Is this better as a welcome, or the tree of Zaqqum?

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! We have appointed it a torment for wrong-doers.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! it is a tree that springeth in the heart of hell.

name: Pickthall
text: Its crop is as it were the heads of devils

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! they verily must eat thereof, and fill (their) bellies therewith.

name: Pickthall
text: And afterward, lo! thereupon they have a drink of boiling water

name: Pickthall
text: And afterward, lo! their return is surely unto hell.

name: Pickthall
text: They indeed found their fathers astray,

name: Pickthall
text: But they make haste (to follow) in their footsteps.

name: Pickthall
text: And verily most of the men of old went astray before them,

name: Pickthall
text: And verily We sent among them warners.

name: Pickthall
text: Then see the nature of the consequence for those warned,

name: Pickthall
text: Save single-minded slaves of Allah.

name: Pickthall
text: And Noah verily prayed unto Us, and gracious was the Hearer of his prayer

name: Pickthall
text: And We saved him and his household from the great distress,

name: Pickthall
text: And made his seed the survivors,

name: Pickthall
text: And left for him among the later folk (the salutation):

name: Pickthall
text: Peace be unto Noah among the peoples!

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thus do We reward the good.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.

name: Pickthall
text: Then We did drown the others.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! of his persuasion verily was Abraham

name: Pickthall
text: When he came unto his Lord with a whole heart;

name: Pickthall
text: When he said unto his father and his folk: What is it that ye worship?

name: Pickthall
text: Is it a falsehood - gods beside Allah - that ye desire?

name: Pickthall
text: What then is your opinion of the Lord of the Worlds?

name: Pickthall
text: And he glanced a glance at the stars

name: Pickthall
text: Then said: Lo! I feel sick!

name: Pickthall
text: And they turned their backs and went away from him.

name: Pickthall
text: Then turned he to their gods and said: Will ye not eat?

name: Pickthall
text: What aileth you that ye speak not?

name: Pickthall
text: Then he attacked them, striking with his right hand.

name: Pickthall
text: And (his people) came toward him, hastening.

name: Pickthall
text: He said: Worship ye that which ye yourselves do carve

name: Pickthall
text: When Allah hath created you and what ye make?

name: Pickthall
text: They said: Build for him a building and fling him in the red-hotfire.

name: Pickthall
text: And they designed a snare for him, but We made them the undermost.

name: Pickthall
text: And he said: Lo! I am going unto my Lord Who will guide me.

name: Pickthall
text: My Lord! Vouchsafe me of the righteous.

name: Pickthall
text: So We gave him tidings of a gentle son.

name: Pickthall
text: And when (his son) was old enough to walk with him, (Abraham) said: O my dear son, I have seen in a dream that I must sacrifice thee. So look, what thinkest thou? He said: O my father! Do that which thou art commanded. Allah willing, thou shalt find me of the steadfast.

name: Pickthall
text: Then, when they had both surrendered (to Allah), and he had flung him down upon his face,

name: Pickthall
text: We called unto him: O Abraham!

name: Pickthall
text: Thou hast already fulfilled the vision. Lo! thus do We reward the good.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! that verily was a clear test.

name: Pickthall
text: Then We ransomed him with a tremendous victim.

name: Pickthall
text: And We left for him among the later folk (the salutation):

name: Pickthall
text: Peace be unto Abraham!

name: Pickthall
text: Thus do We reward the good.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! he is one of Our believing slaves.

name: Pickthall
text: And we gave him tidings of the birth of Isaac, a prophet of the righteous.

name: Pickthall
text: And We blessed him and Isaac. And of their seed are some who do good, and some who plainly wrong themselves.

name: Pickthall
text: And We verily gave grace unto Moses and Aaron,

name: Pickthall
text: And saved them and their people from the great distress,

name: Pickthall
text: And helped them so that they became the victors.

name: Pickthall
text: And We gave them the clear Scripture

name: Pickthall
text: And showed them the right path.

name: Pickthall
text: And We left for them among the later folk (the salutation):

name: Pickthall
text: Peace be unto Moses and Aaron!

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thus do We reward the good.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! they are two of Our believing slaves.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn),

name: Pickthall
text: When he said unto his folk: Will ye not ward off (evil)?

name: Pickthall
text: Will ye cry unto Baal and forsake the Best of creators,

name: Pickthall
text: Allah, your Lord and Lord of your forefathers?

name: Pickthall
text: But they denied him, so they surely will be haled forth (to the doom)

name: Pickthall
text: Save single-minded slaves of Allah.

name: Pickthall
text: And we left for him among the later folk (the salutation):

name: Pickthall
text: Peace be unto Elias!

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! thus do We reward the good.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! he is one of our believing slaves.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! Lot verily was of those sent (to warn).

name: Pickthall
text: When We saved him and his household, every one,

name: Pickthall
text: Save an old woman among those who stayed behind;

name: Pickthall
text: Then We destroyed the others.

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! ye verily pass by (the ruin of) them in the morning

name: Pickthall
text: And at night-time; have ye then no sense?

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! Jonah verily was of those sent (to warn)

name: Pickthall
text: When he fled unto the laden ship,

name: Pickthall
text: And then drew lots and was of those rejected;

name: Pickthall
text: And the fish swallowed him while he was blameworthy;

name: Pickthall
text: And had he not been one of those who glorify (Allah)

name: Pickthall
text: He would have tarried in its belly till the day when they are raised;

name: Pickthall
text: Then We cast him on a desert shore while he was sick;

name: Pickthall
text: And We caused a tree of gourd to grow above him;

name: Pickthall
text: And We sent him to a hundred thousand (folk) or more

name: Pickthall
text: And they believed, therefor We gave them comfort for a while.

name: Pickthall
text: Now ask them (O Muhammad): Hath thy Lord daughters whereas they have sons?

name: Pickthall
text: Or created We the angels females while they were present?

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! it is of their falsehood that they say:

name: Pickthall
text: Allah hath begotten. Allah! verily they tell a lie.

name: Pickthall
text: (And again of their falsehood): He hath preferred daughters to sons.

name: Pickthall
text: What aileth you? How judge ye?

name: Pickthall
text: Will ye not then reflect?

name: Pickthall
text: Or have ye a clear warrant?

name: Pickthall
text: Then produce your writ, if ye are truthful.

name: Pickthall
text: And they imagine kinship between him and the jinn, whereas the jinn know well that they will be brought before (Him).

name: Pickthall
text: Glorified be Allah from that which they attribute (unto Him),

name: Pickthall
text: Save single-minded slaves of Allah.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! verily, ye and that which ye worship,

name: Pickthall
text: Ye cannot excite (anyone) against Him.

name: Pickthall
text: Save him who is to burn in hell.

name: Pickthall
text: There is not one of us but hath his known position.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! we, even we are they who set the ranks,

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! we, even we are they who hymn His praise

name: Pickthall
text: And indeed they used to say:

name: Pickthall
text: If we had but a reminder from the men of old

name: Pickthall
text: We would be single-minded slaves of Allah.

name: Pickthall
text: Yet (now that it is come) they disbelieve therein; but they will come to know.

name: Pickthall
text: And verily Our word went forth of old unto Our bondmen sent (to warn)

name: Pickthall
text: That they verily would be helped,

name: Pickthall
text: And that Our host, they verily would be the victors.

name: Pickthall
text: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad) awhile,

name: Pickthall
text: And watch, for they will (soon) see.

name: Pickthall
text: Would they hasten on Our doom?

name: Pickthall
text: But when it cometh home to them, then it will be a hapless morn for those who have been warned.

name: Pickthall
text: Withdraw from them awhile

name: Pickthall
text: And watch, for they will (soon) see.

name: Pickthall
text: Glorified be thy Lord, the Lord of Majesty, from that which they attribute (unto Him)

name: Pickthall
text: And peace be unto those sent (to warn).

name: Pickthall
text: And praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds!
